data.name: Mikanko of the Oohime
data.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Mikanko Kagura". Cannot be destroyed by battle, also your opponent takes any battle damage you would take from battles involving this card instead. You can only use each of the following effects of "Mikanko of the Oohime" once per turn. You can reveal this card in your hand; add 1 "Mikanko" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Mikanko of the Oohime", then discard 1 card. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Equip Spell in your GY; equip it to an appropriate monster on the field.
